review: So very good role play I find for my part, we are often entitled to mysterious updates which generally hide new bosses but I must admit that the recently added boss called Omicron is very hard to defeat and has characteristics that are a little bit cheat to my taste. PS: don't take the 3rd dose skill point it's a trap!

author: curtis
review: Since the arrival of the last Boss (Deltacron) impossible to finish the game... On the other hand the age limit should be set at 18, pck end up with kids who groan from the start "not the thing in l piff" it's tiring. Parcontre it's a great idea the goodies distributed in pharmacies: star-struck:

author: Raphaël
review: I put a 4 star because in itself the game is good, there are new variants that appear from time to time which adds novelties, another positive point is that we cannot know when the rules will change and how it changes, what will be the decisions. Since the "3rd dose" update, it's getting faster and faster to get it, which makes it easier, but the developers could add other viruses because it's starting to get tiring, that said, it's getting harder and harder not to take the covid, but this one becomes easier to fight which, in the end can change. In any case I recommend it to you, strongly that it comes out on pc or ps5.

author: DaniDa
review: The application allows you to follow and know the latest news about the epidemic. Unfortunately, it doesn't work as it should. Settings, bluetooth etc. activated, despite the fact that I am in Paris (very high incidence and contamination rate), I do not receive any notification as to whether I am in the presence of a contact/positive case or not. I now use the application for my exit certificates.
